data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Culebra, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Culebra, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,800 citizens of Culebra, Puerto Rico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 585 believers in Culebra that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Culebra, Puerto Rico to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Culebra
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Culebra, Culebra, Puerto Rico.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Culebra, Puerto Rico, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 585 believers in Culebra, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Culebra, Puerto Rico has a population of 1,800.

We estimate Culebra has 585 people who might know Jesus, 1,117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 98 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Culebra to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
